io.github.sanjai.ProPad.finish-args-host-filesystem-access: ProPad is a markdown editor that needs to open and save markdown files anywhere on the system. Similar to text editors and IDEs, users expect to work with documents in arbitrary locations.
io.github.sanjai.ProPad.appid-url-not-reachable: The linter constructs https://github.com/sanjai/propad from the app-id but the actual repository is at https://github.com/Sanjai-Shaarugesh/ProPad
io.github.sanjai.ProPad.finish-args-arbitrary-dbus-access: ProPad needs session bus access for GTK application registration and D-Bus service communication. It also uses org.gtk.vfs.* for GVFS file system access to handle network locations and special URIs, and org.freedesktop.FileManager1 to open file manager from the app.
io.github.sanjai.ProPad.finish-args-dconf-talk-name: App requires persistent settings storage via dconf
io.github.sanjai.ProPad.finish-args-direct-dconf-path: App requires persistent settings storage via dconf
io.github.sanjai.ProPad.finish-args-portal-talk-name: App requires portal access for file chooser and desktop integration
